short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tadej Pogačar Wins on the profesional peloton this Year

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a fan of Tadej Pogačar and want to stay updated on his impressive victories in the professional peloton? The "Tadej Pogačar Wins" extension is perfect for you.

Features:
- Real-Time Victory Counter: Displays a badge on the extension icon with the current number of Tadej Pogačar's wins, updated regularly.
- Detailed List: Click on the extension icon to see a complete list of Pogačar's victories. Each entry includes event details and a direct link to view more on Twitter.
- Quick and Easy Access: Get all the information about Pogačar's wins without searching multiple websites. Everything is just one click away, directly from your browser.

Why Install This Extension?
- Stay Informed: If you're a cycling fan, especially of Tadej Pogacar, this extension keeps you updated with his latest achievements.
- Save Time: Instead of manually searching for Pogacar's wins, receive all the information directly in your browser quickly and efficiently.
- Share the Excitement: Each win comes with a link so you can easily share the news on Twitter and join the conversation with other fans.
- Install "Tadej Pogacar Wins" and never miss any of the thrilling victories of one of the world's top cyclists.

Developer: https://x.com/victorarroba
